page.title: 08HEALTH IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
{Rossendale General Hospital}is located on the outskirts of Haslingden. It is a maternity hospital, but does not have a casualty ward. Emergencies have to go to Bury General Hospital.
The hospital is located on high ground affording a magnificent view of Helmshore district. On higher ground behind the hospital there is a disused quarry and reservoir. This has meant that building developments have not taken place,leaving the hospital with its commanding viewpoints.
Doctors and dentists are to be found in Haslingden town centre.These are outside the Helmshore area.
